name: Red Forest (Boo64)
description:
紅森林

The woodcutter began hearing voices in his head. At first just whispered but soon the voices grew louder and clearer. Urging him into the woods to kill the demonic spirits feeding on their flesh.  He can resist the voices and ask the strange man in the wood for guidance. This man tells him to collect the talismans for he is being tricked by a forest demon.

Red Forest is an atmospheric horror experience about being loosing your mind in the woods, with multiple endings, it was made in 3 weeks for the Haunted PS1 Jam with a theme of "Folk Horror".  Which will have an additional two weeks added put into it. 

Controls:

WASD- walk

Look- mouse

Shift- run

interact  - E

interact with dialogue - left click

(Disclaimer) - Planning on doing an additional update adding npc's and extra visual stuff, making the weapons more grotesque and adding addition animation to the weapons as well as Easter eggs and more interactivity, more choices coming in the next 2 - 3 weeks
